Articles.Content:
This is what happened to the forums:

![tumblr_lpoplxPXkV1qg39ewo1_500.gif](https://31.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lpoplxPXkV1qg39ewo1_500.gif)

> 
> Bet they're doing maintainance over there.
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> Aw, missed it.

I bet its "excessive load."
Lool SteamDB

> 
> Scott Manley just encountered the Kraken.

Nah, I think that's just his daughter.

> 
> Nah, I think that's just his daughter.

What little bit I saw of it looked like the Kraken. I'm only half watching.

> 
> Uh, guys.... Steamdb just died.
> [http://i.imgur.com/5NEEgQ6.png](http://i.imgur.com/5NEEgQ6.png)

So, really, everything related to KSP is being unintentionally DDOSed.
Another crash.

Am I the only one building rockets without thinking?

![kwF1RqX.png](http://i.imgur.com/kwF1RqX.png)
Yeah, had a long load time of the forum a sec ago.

MOAR BOOOOSTERSSS!!!!!!!!! I MEEN HYPE!!!!! 

Or let's just attach the boosters to the hype!= AWESOME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Forums are crashing more than the kerbals now.
Whats making that grapefruit explode anyway? Injected hydrogen?

> 
> Whats making that grapefruit explode anyway? Injected hydrogen?

Looks like a fire cracker.
5 posts happened at 16:37
15 more pages till we reach 187.
So much hyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyypeeeeeeeeee!!!

Lol, Scott just started a cargo plane, dropped out his surfbord, flew the surfboard around, then 'landed' back into the still flying cargo plane, closed the doors, and landed at the runway.

Well yeah, 1.0 aerodynamics seem to deliver.

\*tastatur only ofc

> 
> 15 more pages till we reach 187.

Is that number special in some way?
I'm the only one stucked at 35 pages?
Forums crashed again. (this is faster than danny's kerbals die in even his most deadly videos)

> 
> Is that number special in some way?

> 
> [.90 thread was 111 pages](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101290-The-Official-HypeTrain-0-90-Voyage-Thread-%28Experimentals%21-Choo-Choo-Dangit%21%29?)
> 
> [.25 thread was 187 pages](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94061-The-0-25-Waiting-Room-now-boarding-passengers-heading-to-Hypetown)
> 
> [.24 thread was 298 pages](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79878-The-unofficially-official-0-24-Kerbapalooza-Thread-Now-extra-HYPETRAIN%21)
> 
> [.23.5 thread was 105 pages](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/73150-The-ARM-megathread)

![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

The HypeTrain is outdated.

![oXXsfos.gif](http://i.imgur.com/oXXsfos.gif)

Yes. With random Pokemon characters included.
Oh, forum is back? Crashing it a day before launch is quite formidable.
Lol! XD
Oof, doing missions around Dres in low orbit is SLOW due to the low timewarp limit, and Dres's fast spin.....
